author: raz
title: SustainableADA Goals Token Research
description: There isn't a user friendly, transparent way to directly invest towards Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) you're passionate about.
solution: Researching the basis of creating a platform + token for impact investing, directly connecting you to SDGs projects you're passionate about.
experience: Economics, Sustainability, Humanities, Social Sciences, NGO's, Social Entrepreneurs, Writers, Blogging, Video Editing, Figma, Canva, AdobeCC
